text.en: Uniting myself with you, the goddess,

text.en-trans: dak ni rabtu nyam jar chir

text.en: May I always arise and manifest
In the form of the ḍākinī,
In this world and the next.
May all experience happiness and everlasting joy,
At the time of death, may heroes and yoginīs,
text.en-trans: chi tsé pawo naljorma nam kyi

text.en: Holding flower garlands, victory banners and parasols,
text.en-trans: metok treng dang gyaltsen duk tok shing

text.en: Welcome me with clouds of songs and music
text.en-trans: luyang rolmö trin gyi dün sü té

text.en: And lead me to a celestial realm.
text.en-trans: kha la chöpé drong du tripar shok

text.en: Appearance is great bliss, the Heruka Lord of the Dance;
Emptiness is the Mother Vajravārāhī, endowed with supreme qualities;
By the truth of their indivisible union,
May the twofold purpose and all our wishes be completely fulfilled!
text.en-trans: dön nyi döpa yongsu dzok gyur chik
